name: Medium Vase
description:
H 11"

A floral vase with a voice, this vase is designed with a bottled neck to tell your flowers where to fellowship, while its large slate surface gets the festivities started with words in chalk

Quote of the day:
“You're the designer with the unique finish on this classic glass vase. Perfect for holidays, you can add your custom message and fill with flower colors to suit the event. Or consider writing a note to someone special and gifting a bouquet. You'll want to get a few to have on hand for housewarming parties and weddings. Just fill with kitchen tools, like a spatula, tongs and whisk - then add a special message to suit the occasion.” 

  -ShopNBC

name: Red Wine
description:
20oz | 50cl

You’ve taken the time to choose the perfect wine and execute the perfect matching steak, don’t lose your glass, give it a nametag on the sleek slate finish

Quote of the day: 
“Always a great conversation starter, the Chalkboard China wine glass will ensure you will be the toast of the evening! Grab a couple of boxes to be sure you have enough to go around.” 

   –Lot18 Wine Team

name: Champagne Glass
description:
8oz. | 207ml

Worthy of a toast to the bride and groom but also ready to salute top sales team of the year – oh! and don’t forget when the clock strikes 12 its time to do it all over again, Happy New Year! Make that occasion extra special with a celebration written in chalk on the base of this elegant champagne stem. Cheers!

Quote of the day: 
“We think the clever host could avoid beverage mix-ups by writing guests’ names around the slate-finished base on the glasses. Or start a party game by writing a theme word on each glass (how about avarice, lipstick, technology?) and have guests expound on that topic for one minute. And when it gets late, simply wipe off the names or words and replace them with a simple directive — 'go home,' perhaps?” 

  – Vicky Sanderson, Home Columnist, The Toronto Star

name: Daisy Vase
description:
H 6.5"

Ready to use alone or accompanied by friends, the chalk-friendly daisy vase is ready for any occasion.

Quote of the Day: “The sweet Daisy Vase Set from Chalkboard China is bud-worthy of any wildflowers picked during a leisurely stroll, and is a wonderful way to welcome someone to the breakfast table after enjoying a restful night's sleep away from home. I love the fact that these vases can be personalized to include whatever message the gift giver (or recipient) sees fit at that moment. Made from hand-blown glass, they are covered with a chalkboard finish for the perfect inscription. And when that certain sentiment has faded, along with the flowers, the vases wipe clean, ready for their next special occasion. With a hostess gift like this, you may just guarantee yourself a return invitation next summer.

  -Pamela Brill, Editor-at-Large for Gifts & Decorative Accessories

name: Rectangle Vase
description:
H 6"

With his four sides of writing surface the rectangle vase may be short but he is no Napoleon. He is cool and confident, knowing that the most renowned florists, event planners and designers will find him the MOST attractive of them all.

Quote of the day:  
“A Chalkboard China rectangle vase would be great for a "game-watching" party! Each time someone scores you could write the score on the vase OR you could flank your centerpiece with two vases, one for each team!  As people go for food they can sign the vase that belongs to the team they are rooting for.” 

  –Kimberly Schlegel Whitman 

Idea#: Draw an orange jack-o'-lantern on a rectangular vase for a Halloween treat holder.

name: 13" Charger Plate
description:
If it's an occasion worthy of your best china, crystal, and silver then it's an occasion for the Chalkboard China Charger Plate. Obsessive Entertainers, honor your special guests with a personalized, elegant dinner setting.

Quote of the day: 
“Coax your friend with the beautiful handwriting to inscribe the bride's and groom's names on chargers for your daughter’s formal wedding dinner.” 

  –  Cathy Frisinger Editor, Indulge

name: Candace Jean's Happening Hostess Candle
description:
8 oz Chalk-friendly, hand-poured soy blend 

Name Game: Our designer, Candace Jean, has a background in home fashions and consumer products.  She designed Chalkboard China out of her love for entertaining with style and her obsession with bringing the best gift to the party.

Her inspiration came from her mother, grandmothers and great-grandmothers who all instilled in her the importance of making others feel loved and welcomed in your home. Southern hospitality is part of who she is.

name: Gift Card - $50
description: Gift the gift of Chalkboard China to your best friends.  Gift Cards are emailed to your registered PayPal email.

name: Gift Card - $100
description: Give the gift of Chalkboard China to your best friend.  Gift Cards are emailed to the registered PayPal email address.

name: Margarita Glass
description:
13oz.  |  384ml

Estoy buscando el partido. Fiesta, forever!

A note from Candace Jean:
"Lifestyle Entertaining is what its all about, we all want fun entertaining items that are livable that encourage friends and families to gather together and make memories. These margarita glasses are for your next fiesta but can be the home to shrimp cocktail, desserts, candies, nuts, tons of ideas but again the best part of these glasses are the chalk-friendly slate finish remember what I told you earlier 'sally need never sip from susies glass again!' 

These are the glasses that are ready to whisk you off to that vacation while your really enjoy a stay-cation ☺ Cheladas are my favorite and I can tell you this glass whisks me away to Playa every time."

name: Martini Glass
description:
12oz.  |  355ml

Experience summer fun with Chalkboard China, where you can relax and cool down with a taste of paradise.  This martini glass is ready to join your party with your friends and family! 

A note from Candace Jean: 
"Dirty, straight-up or filled with mashed potatoes - I’m ready to wow even your most boring guest."

name: 10" Plate
description:
10" Diameter

Ten inches of sleek slate surface are ready to lay down or stand up and shout, it’s the perfect kitchen message menu board but also is perfect to adorn your luncheon logo with a clear luncheon plate over top

Quote of the day: 
"We came across Chalkboard China as we began building our 2009 collections, and immediately fell in love with the blank slate chargers and salad plates," says Rope of RSVP Soiree. "The collections are sleek in their presentation but utilitarian in execution. A base plate that clients can hand draw logos onto? Brilliant."

name: Carafe
description:
1L | H10.5"

Ready to revolutionize your secret box wine into your {insert you last name her} FAMILY HOUSE WINE! simply pour it into this fabulous slate carafe and your bargain wine takes on a brand name all it’s own. 

Quote of the day: 
“Warmer temperatures mean outdoor entertaining will soon be on the calendar. Our team is abuzz with clever and fun ideas to enjoy pleasant weather with friends and family. We love the idea of packing a picnic basket and blanket to enjoy an outdoor concert. Chalkboard China’s stemware allows you and your guests to write your name or whatever you like on your glass. No chance of poachers!” 

–Designers @Joss&Main

name: Large Vase
description:
H 13"

On the sleek slate finish of the large vase, add an elegant formal font to this floral vase and it will be perfectly fitting for your fairy tale day, and gift givers (aren’t we all), name that bouquet with a slate-finished large flower vase.

Quote of the day:

Idea#:

name: Wine Glass
description:
18oz. | 53cl

Wine lovers, give your glass a nametag on the goblet’s slate-finished base while enjoying and exploring the world’s finest wines.

Quote of the day: 
“Wine charms are so last year. Isn’t it time to let your guests get creative when claiming their stemware? Now you can with Chalkboard China. The base of these sleek, chic glasses is finished with chalk-friendly slate so each person can label his or her own glass. Personalize and customize your goblets for every occasion. I, for one, always struggled with wine charms. I could never remember which charm was mine, especially as the evening — or afternoon — wore on. Since exclusively using Chalkboard China at our frequent soirees, we have no more mix ups! I can always identify my beverage with my glass clearly labeled “ELB only!”  

   – Eric Lawrence Brown, Certified Court of Master Sommeliers
